title: 2 turn of the century Baseball team photos for sale***BOTH SOLD***
author: Archive

posts.post_title: 2 turn of the century Baseball team photos for sale***BOTH SOLD***
posts.post_content:
Posted By: scott brockelman
I have 2 framed baseball team original photographs for sale.

The 1st is a late 1800's approx. 10" x 8" albumen photo on a larger mount in a period frame. The players all wear uniforms with Walker on them, except one which appears to say Macomis Bros?. Normal Bat, Ball & Glove display. The photo appears very nice with good contrast and clarity, it does have 2 old pinholes which I did not even see until removing it from the frame. Appears to have original glass as well. I would say this item has all been intact since made. $149 delivered. SOLD

The 2nd is an early 20th century small panoramic photo approx. 17" x 8", in what appears to be the original frame. The players are probably a school or town team and all have Lincoln on the jerseys. $49 delivered. SOLD

Scott
